Metadata.description: Remove unwanted people from photos instantly with AI. It's incredibly easy to erase tourists, strangers, or any person from your pictures and get flawless results.

hero.title: Remove people from photos with AI
hero.description: Brush over anyone you want gone ‚Äî results appear in seconds. Clean edges, natural backgrounds, no Photoshop needed.

dropzone.title: Drag and drop an image here, or click to upload
dropzone.subtitle: or click to browse

howItWorks.title: How to remove people from photos

step1.title: Upload your photo
step1.description: Pick the photo you want to clean up.

step2.title: Brush to remove people
step2.description: Brush to mark who goes, tap Apply, and see results in seconds. Everything else stays untouched.

step3.title: Download your finished photo
step3.description: Your photo is ready. Export and use it anywhere‚Äîsocial media, print, or archive. Zoom in to double-check edges before you save.

howItWorks.optional: Already happy with the result? You're done. Want to do more? You can also move people closer, swap backgrounds, upscale for print, or adjust the composition.
howItWorks.cta: See what else you can do

results.title: See it in action
results.subtitle: Every example holds up at 100% zoom. Click to inspect edges, textures, and shadows yourself.

travel.title: Travel landmarks / crowds
travel.copy: Turn busy travel shots into cleaner memories. Use the brush to remove strangers and tourists from photos while keeping the landmark and your main subject intact.
travel.details: Straight lines stay straight, brick and stone textures flow naturally, and ground shadows disappear with the people who cast them‚Äîeven at 100% zoom.
travel.beforeAlt: Crowded landmark photo with tourists and strangers in the background.
travel.afterAlt: Same landmark photo after removing strangers from the background.

photobombers.title: Photobombers
photobombers.copy: Remove photobombers from photos when someone jumps into the frame at the worst moment. Brush the photobomber only‚Äîyour subject stays untouched.
photobombers.details: Hair and shoulder edges stay crisp, clothing seams remain intact, and contact points on the ground blend seamlessly.
photobombers.beforeAlt: Street photo with a photobomber behind the subject.
photobombers.afterAlt: Street photo after removing the photobomber cleanly.

ex.title: Remove your ex
ex.copy: Relationship over but the photos aren't? Remove your ex from photos and keep the memories that matter‚Äîwithout the person who doesn't. No need to send private photos to strangers online or pay someone you don't know.
ex.details: Brush over your ex, download a clean result, and move on. Edges stay clean, backgrounds fill naturally, and no one will know they were ever there.
ex.beforeAlt: Photo with ex-partner that needs to be removed.
ex.afterAlt: Photo after removing ex-partner, with clean natural background.

keepSome.title: Keep only certain people
keepSome.copy: Keep the people you care about and remove unwanted people from pictures‚Äîwhether that's background strangers, distant relatives, or anyone you'd rather not keep in the frame. This is the fastest way to clean up group photos without redoing the whole shot.
keepSome.details: Even when people are pressed together‚Äîhair crossing, arms touching, shoulders overlapping‚Äîedges stay clean and shadows blend naturally. This is where most tools fail. Ours doesn't.
keepSome.beforeAlt: Group photo with several extra people in the frame.
keepSome.afterAlt: Group photo with only selected people kept after removal.

solo.title: Solo portrait from a group shot
solo.copy: Need a clean "just me" photo? Remove others from a group shot to create a solo portrait‚Äîfor a memorial slideshow, presentation, profile photo, or resume.
solo.details: Skin texture stays natural, the background fills in seamlessly, and even tricky areas near shoulders and hair come out clean.
solo.beforeAlt: Group photo intended to be turned into a solo portrait.
solo.afterAlt: Solo portrait created by removing other people from the group photo.

weddings.title: Print-worthy moments (weddings & events)
weddings.copy: For wedding photos, formal events, invitations, and framed prints, small mistakes become obvious. Brush removal helps you get a cleaner photo that still looks authentic‚Äîready when you need it, even on the same day.
weddings.details: Fine details like lace, veils, hair, and fabric edges stay sharp. Lighting stays consistent. Patterns don't repeat unnaturally. The result holds up at full resolution‚Äîready for print.
weddings.beforeAlt: Wedding photo with distracting background guests.
weddings.afterAlt: Wedding photo cleaned for print after removing background people.

results.cta: Try it free‚Äîupload your photo now.

tech.title: Powered by Google Nano Banana
tech.lead: Our removal engine is built on Google Nano Banana‚Äîthe same AI behind Gemini 2.5 Flash Image. It understands scene structure, preserves lighting and shadows, and fills removed areas with context-aware detail.
tech.detail: That's why edges stay clean, textures don't repeat unnaturally, and results hold up at 100% zoom.

socialProof.title: What people are saying about Nano Banana

quote1.text: Had to do a double take.
quote1.author: Reddit user, r/GeminiAI

quote2.text: And just like that, the age of photographic evidence is over.
quote2.author: @AlexanderPayton (2.4M views on X)

beyondRemoval.title: Go beyond removal
beyondRemoval.lead: Your removal is complete‚Äîready to download and use. But sometimes you want to take it further: recompose the frame, bring people together, or try a different background.
beyondRemoval.contrast: Most tools stop at removal. For anything else, you'd open Photoshop. We let you keep creating‚Äîall inside the same editor, right after removal. This is what sets us apart.
beyondRemoval.howToAccess: After brush removal, click "Continue Editing" inside the editor.

extend.title: Extend the frame and re-compose
extend.description: Want a wider shot or a different crop? Expand the canvas and reposition your subject‚Äîno need to settle for what the original frame gave you.
extend.contrast: Other tools stop at removal. Ours lets you reshape the entire composition.
extend.beforeAlt: Photo after removal, with subject off-center.
extend.afterAlt: Same photo with extended frame and subject re-centered.

move.title: Move people closer
move.description: Want a tighter group shot? Bring everyone together naturally‚Äîno cutting and pasting, no obvious seams.
move.contrast: Other tools stop at removal. Ours lets you reposition who's left.
move.beforeAlt: Group photo after removal, with space between remaining people.
move.afterAlt: Same group photo with people moved closer together.

background.title: Change background
background.description: The removal is done, but the background doesn't match the moment. Swap to a cleaner backdrop‚Äîstudio, scenic, or simply less distracting.
background.beforeAlt: Cleaned photo with original busy background.
background.afterAlt: Cleaned photo with a new, simpler background.

polish.title: Polish the look
polish.description: Unify lighting and color so the final result feels intentional‚Äînatural tones, cinematic contrast, or a warmer mood for events and portraits.
polish.beforeAlt: Cleaned photo with original lighting and color.
polish.afterAlt: Cleaned photo with polished lighting and color.

enhance.title: Enhance resolution
enhance.description: Working with a video screenshot or an old low-res photo? Upscale it to print-ready quality. Details get sharper, textures stay natural, and the result holds up at larger sizes.
enhance.afterAlt: Same photo upscaled with enhanced clarity and detail.

beyondRemoval.proNote: AI Edit features require Pro. Start with free trial credits to test removal quality.

privacy.title: Privacy first
privacy.body: Your photos are uploaded, processed, and made available for download‚Äînever shared publicly. You stay in control from upload to download.

bullets.noTraining: Photos are not used to train AI models
bullets.deleted: All uploads are automatically deleted within 24 hours

pricing.description: Try free with limited credits. Upgrade for unlimited removals, 4K exports, and AI Edit.

pricing.footnote: Free trial lets you test quality before committing. See Pricing for full plan details.

q1.question: Will removal change the faces I want to keep?
q1.answer: No. Brush removal only affects the areas you brush. Faces and features you don't touch stay exactly as they are.

q2.question: How do I avoid an "AI look" after removal?
q2.answer: Zoom to 100% and check edges, repeating patterns, and shadows. If it looks believable up close, it'll look great everywhere.

q3.question: Will it work on complex backgrounds (trees, fences, crowds, patterns)?
q3.answer: Often yes‚Äîcomplex textures just require more careful brushing and a closer 100% check.

q4.question: What if people overlap or block each other (hair/hands/clothing)?
q4.answer: We handle overlap well. Zoom in, work in small sections, and you'll get clean edges even where people are touching or crossing.

q5.question: Does it handle veils, lace, or semi-transparent materials?
q5.answer: It can, but thin/semi-transparent edges need careful brushing. Zoom in and work slowly around the edge details.

q6.question: Does it remove shadows automatically?
q6.answer: Brush over both the person and their shadow. The tool fills both areas naturally‚Äîshadows don't get left behind.

q7.question: What if the person I'm removing is hugging or touching someone I want to keep?
q7.answer: Brush carefully around the contact area. We handle these tricky spots well‚Äîzoom in and work in small sections for the cleanest result.

q8.question: How do I remove people from photos online?
q8.answer: Upload your photo, brush over the people you want to remove, then download the result. Results update in real time as you brush.

q9.question: Can I keep some people and remove others (keep X, remove Y)?
q9.answer: Yes. Brush only who you want gone‚Äîeveryone else stays untouched.

q10.question: Can I remove multiple people at once?
q10.answer: Yes. Remove people in sections for better control, especially in crowds or busy backgrounds.

q11.question: Can I make a solo portrait from a group photo?
q11.answer: Yes. Remove others from the group shot, then export or re-frame for a clean solo portrait.

q12.question: Can I remove crowds or background people from travel photos?
q12.answer: Yes. For large crowds, removing in smaller sections helps keep textures and lines looking natural.

q13.question: Can I move people closer together after removal?
q13.answer: Yes. After brush removal, click "Continue Editing" to bring people together naturally‚Äîno cutting and pasting required.

q14.question: Can I remove my ex from photos?
q14.answer: Yes. Brush over them, download a clean result, and keep the photo without the person.

q15.question: Does it work on my phone?
q15.answer: Yes‚Äîuse it in a modern mobile browser (Safari or Chrome). No app download needed.

q16.question: Can I use a video screenshot or low-resolution image?
q16.answer: Yes. For better results, use "Continue Editing" to upscale after removal‚Äîdetails get sharper and the photo becomes print-ready.

q17.question: Can I remove people from multiple photos at once (batch)?
q17.answer: Not yet. Each photo is processed individually for now.

q18.question: How long does processing take?
q18.answer: Results appear in real time as you brush‚Äîusually within seconds. Export is ready as soon as you're happy with the result.

q19.question: Do you store my photos?
q19.answer: Photos are stored temporarily for processing and automatically deleted within 24 hours. We do not share your photos publicly or use them to train AI models.

item-1.name: Jonathan Yombo
item-1.quote: MkSaaS is really extraordinary and very practical, no need to break your head. A real gold mine.

item-2.name: Yves Kalume
item-2.quote: With no experience in webdesign I just redesigned my entire website in a few minutes with tailwindcss thanks to MkSaaS.

item-3.name: Yucel Faruksahan
item-3.quote: Great work on MkSaaS template. This is one of the best personal website that I have seen so far :)

item-4.name: Anonymous author
item-4.quote: I downloaded the one of MkSaaS template which is very clear to understand at the start and you could modify the codes/blocks to fit perfectly on your purpose of the page.

item-5.name: Shekinah Tshiokufila
item-5.quote: MkSaaS is redefining the standard of web design, with these blocks it provides an easy and efficient way for those who love beauty but may lack the time to implement it.

item-6.name: Oketa Fred
item-6.quote: I absolutely love MkSaaS! The component blocks are beautifully designed and easy to use, which makes creating a great-looking website a breeze.

item-7.name: Zeki
item-7.quote: MkSaaS is the perfect fusion of simplicity and versatility, enabling us to create UIs that are as stunning as they are user-friendly.

item-8.name: Joseph Kitheka
item-8.quote: MkSaaS has transformed the way I develop web applications. Their extensive collection of UI components, blocks, and templates has significantly accelerated my workflow.

item-9.name: Khatab Wedaa
item-9.quote: MkSaaS is an elegant, clean, and responsive tailwind css components it's very helpful to start fast with your project.

item-10.name: Rodrigo Aguilar
item-10.quote: I love MkSaaS ‚ù§Ô∏è. The component blocks are well-structured, simple to use, and beautifully designed. It makes it really easy to have a good-looking website in no time.

item-11.name: Eric Ampire
item-11.quote: MkSaaS templates are the perfect solution for anyone who wants to create a beautiful and functional website without any web design experience.

item-12.name: Roland Tubonge
item-12.quote: MkSaaS is so well designed that even with a very poor knowledge of web design you can do miracles. Let yourself be seduced!
